name: Bitter Rocket Challenges
description:
Controls:
  • Control the Character/SpaceShip using the arrow keys or WASD
  • Shoot with space (SpaceShip)
Objective:

Successfully complete all mini-games by entering the caves to get all trophies and claim the championship!

Creation:

This game was made by iriohmon and me in 12 hours for the Bitter Jam (it is our first game jam). We had to use the tileset that was given by them. We did ran out of time as we started late into the jam and we wanted to do much more, especially with the overworld and mini-game ideas. We still hope you enjoy our little game :)

We also respected the both following challenges:

  • Stick to a grid (8x8, 6x8, 5x5, ect.)
  • No overlaying graphics (at no point 2 graphics will overlap each-other so you can see one under the other)
